Constructors

constructor

  • new SlotComposer(options: any): SlotComposer
    • Defined in slot-composer.ts:24

    |options| must contain:

    • affordance: the UI affordance the slots composer render to (for example: dom).
    • rootContainer: the top level container to be used for slots. and may contain:
    • containerKind: the type of container wrapping each slot-context's container (for example, div).

    Parameters

    • options: any

    Returns SlotComposer
